title: Understanding the SAD PERSONS Scale
text: The SAD PERSONS Scale is a tool used by healthcare professionals to assess a specific risk in patients. It is an acronym where each letter stands for a risk factor.

title: Components of the SAD PERSONS Scale
text: The scale includes factors such as sex, age, depression, previous attempts, ethanol abuse, rational thinking loss, social supports lacking, organized plan, no spouse, and sickness.

title: Identifying the Purpose of the Scale
text: Based on the components of the SAD PERSONS Scale, what is the primary risk it aims to measure?
choices: deliberate $$self-inflicted$$ harm that is not intended to result in death
deliberate $$self-inflicted$$ harm that is intended to result in death
